Systems:

HORNET

SSC TOTAL SUITE

The Hornet can hover whenever they move or Boost.

WEAVE

Each round, the first attack made against the Hornet as a reaction automatically fails.

IMPALE SYSTEMS

The Hornet makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, they take {3/4/5} Heat and become Jammed until the end of their next turn.

SUPERSONIC

The Hornet flies to a space in line of sight and range 50 so impossibly fast that it counts as teleportation.

ADAPT/EVADE/DISENGAGE

The Hornet gains Immunity to Grapple and always ignores engagement.

ULTRA

SHOCK AND AWE

The Ultra takes two separate turns each round. They regain spent reactions each time they take a turn.
If the Ultra is facing five or more hostile characters when combat begins, the Ultra takes a third turn each round.

DEADLY

The Ultra deals +1d6 damage on critical hits.

JUGGERNAUT

At the start of the Ultra’s turn, they clear one condition. At the end of their turn, they repair one destroyed weapon or system.

REINFORCED

The Ultra gains +3 Structure and +3 Stress.

LEGENDARY

The Ultra rolls all structure damage and overheating checks twice and chooses either result.

RESILIENT

The Ultra gains +5 HP.

REFLEX

The Ultra can Overwatch unlimited times per round.

LEGION

The Ultra gains +4 E-Defense (to a maximum of 20) and +1 Accuracy on all tech attacks.

SUPREME MELEE

The Ultra gains +1 Accuracy on all melee attacks; additionally, once on their turn, the Ultra can Grapple, Ram, or make a melee attack as a free action.

They roll 1d6: on 4+, they gain Resistance to damage from that attack, and the attacker must repeat the attack against themselves.

Hegemony Active Camo Suite

As a protocol, the Ultra may expend a charge to become Invisible until the end of their next turn. For the duration of this effect, the Ultra's next melee or ranged attack becomes a critical hit if it hits.
